Automatic Biography: Queasy Memoirs

Home | About |

Automatic Biography: Queasy Memoirs is a serialised reading of a novel by one, David Goodchild.

Also available on all major podcast platforms: Anchor | Apple | Google | Spotify | Breaker | Overcast | Pocket Casts | Radio Public | Stitcher

Episode 2 - Don't Touch My Bald Patch/Poem For Tapeworm And Harmonica

25 Jan 2019 - mike

In this episode, we hear chapters two and three, where we’re introduced to Goodchild’s teachers, piss balloons and some tapeworm poetry. Delicious.
